author: rgardler
msg: remove xconf support for plugins. Cocoon has moved away from this technique and we should follow the work on Blocks. This was never in a release and none of our official blocks use it so we can safely remove now. However, I do have a couple of private plugins that use this so a solution is needed

author: brett
msg: refactor to use the streaming signature updater

author: ekoneil
msg: - add stub for JAX-RPC artifact generation (don't bother looking, nothing here yet)
- add tests for header values passed into WS methods in Axis

- fix the web service control tests to account for the 181 spec requirement that IN / INOUT params are usable for RPC encoding or headers.  These tests were doc tests passing IN / INOUT not using headers.
- add TypeUtils class that does the introspection on Holders to determine the held type.  This decouples wsm/src/core from some type stuff that needs to move into the service control.
Test: WSM and service control tests pass

author: ate
msg: Rolling back initial checkin for JS2-21.
